part.content: CHAPTER I : INTRODUCTION. Sec. 1 - 5.
CHAPTER II : GENERAL EXPLANATIONS. Sec.6 - 52A.
CHAPTER III : OF PUNISHMENTS. Sec. 53 - 75.
CHAPTER IV : GENERAL EXCEPTIONS. Sec. 76 - 106.
Of the right of private defence Sec. 96 - 106.
CHAPTER V : OF ABETMENT. Sec. 107 - 120.
CHAPTER VA : CRIMINAL CONSPIRACY. Sec. 120A - 120B.
CHAPTER VI : OF OFFENCES AGAINST THE STATE. Sec. 121 - 130.
CHAPTER VII : OF OFFENCES RELATING TO THE ARMY , NAVY AND AIR FORCE. Sec. 131 - 140.
CHAPTER VIII : OF OFFENCES AGAINST THE PUBLIC TRANQUILLITY. Sec. 141 - 160.
CHAPTER IX : OF OFFENCES BY OR RELATING TO PUBLIC SERVANTS. Sec. 161 - 171.
CHAPTER IXA : OF OFFENCES RELATING TO ELECTIONS. Sec. 171A - 171I.
CHAPTER X : OF CONTEMPTS OF THE LAWFUL AUTHORITY OF PUBLIC SERVANTS. Sec. 172 - 190.
CHAPTER XI : OF FALSE EVIDENCE AND OFFENCES AGAINST PUBLIC JUSTICE. Sec. 191 - 229A.
CHAPTER XII : OF OFFENCES RELATING TO COIN AND GOVERNMENT STAMPS. Sec. 230 - 263A.
CHAPTER XIII : OF OFFENCES RELATING TO WEIGHTS AND MEASURES. Sec. 264 - 267.
CHAPTER XIV : OF OFFENCES AFFECTING THE PUBLIC HEALTH, SAFETY, CONVENIENCE, DECENCY AND MORALS. Sec. 268 - 294A.
CHAPTER XV : OF OFFENCES RELATING TO RELIGION. Sec. 295 - 298.
CHAPTER XVI : OF OFFENCES AFFECTING THE HUMAN BODY. Sec. 299 - 377.
Of offences affecting life Sec. 299 - 311.
Of the causing of miscarriage, of injuries to unborn children, of the exposure of infants, and of the concealment of births Sec. 312 - 318.
Of hurt Sec. 319 - 338.
Of wrongful restraint and wrongful confinement Sec. 339 - 348.
Of criminal force and assault Sec. 349 - 358.
Of kidnapping, abduction, slavery and forced labour Sec. 359 - 374.
Sexual offences Sec. 375 - 376E.
Of unnatural offences Sec. 377.
CHAPTER XVII : OF OFFENCES AGAINST PROPERTY. Sec. 378 - 462.
Of theft Sec. 378 - 382.
Of extortion Sec. 383 - 389.
Of robbery and dacoity Sec 390 - 402.
Of criminal misappropriation of property Sec. 403 - 404.
Of criminal breach of trust Sec. 405 - 409.
Of the receiving of stolen property Sec. 410 - 414.
Of cheating Sec. 415 - 420.
Of fraudulent deeds and dispositions of property Sec. 421 - 424.
Of mischief Sec. 425 - 440.
Of criminal trespass Sec. 441 - 462.
CHAPTER XVIII : OF OFFENCES RELATING TO DOCUMENTS AND TO PROPERTY MARKS. Sec. 463 - 489E.
Of property and other marks Sec. 478 - 489.
Of currency-notes and bank-notes Sec. 489A - 489E.
CHAPTER XIX : OF THE CRIMINAL BREACH OF CONTRACTS OF SERVICE. Sec. 490 - 492.
CHAPTER XX : OF OFFENCES RELATING TO MARRIAGE. Sec. 493 - 498.
CHAPTER XXA : OF CRUELTY BY HUSBAND OR RELATIVES OF HUSBAND. Sec. 498A.
CHAPTER XXI : OF DEFAMATION. Sec. 499 - 502.
CHAPTER XXII : OF CRIMINAL INTIMIDATION, INSULT AND ANNOYANCE. Sec.503 - 510.
CHAPTER XXIII : OF ATTEMPTS TO COMMIT OFFENCES. Sec. 511.
